thread.title: Florida quarterback gets offer from Tennessee
thread.title_full: Florida quarterback gets offer from Tennessee

title: Florida quarterback gets offer from Tennessee
text:
Florida quarterback gets offer from Tennessee A quarterback from Orlando, Fla., picked up an offer from Tennessee on Tuesday. 
Three-star junior quarterback Joe Milton of Olympia High School in Orlando, Fla., posted on his Twitter account Tuesday night that he received a scholarship offer from Tennessee. 
"Blessed to receive another from the university of Tennessee #govols," he tweeted. 
The 6-foot-5, 222-pound Milton holds offers from more than a dozen schools, including Miami, South Carolina, Missouri, Arizona, Boston College, Iowa State, Minnesota, Syracuse and Florida Atlantic. 
He's ranked the nation's No. 400 overall prospect and No. 17 pro-style quarterback in the 247Sports Composite for the 2018 class. Author
